name: clickguard-monorepo
description: ClickGuard - Real-time click fraud detection and automated IP blocking for Google Ads campaigns

scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd apps/backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.clean: npm run clean:backend && npm run clean:frontend
scripts.clean:backend: cd apps/backend && rm -rf node_modules dist build
scripts.clean:frontend: cd apps/frontend && rm -rf node_modules dist build .next

author: ClickGuard Team
